CARGO TANKS: 13,404.107 CUBICS PLUS SLOP TANKS: 687.371 CUBICS

TANK COATING: MARINE LINE 784 //// BUILT: 2008
SIRE: DATED 13th AUG 2024 @ KANDLA
CDI: DATED 20th MAY 2024 @ HAZIRA
LAST 3 CARGOS:                ETHANOL / PFAD+PHENOL / LUBES
OPENING JUBAIL:             27th – 31st AUGUST 2024
PLS PROPOSE SUITABLE CARGOS
Regards,
KT Muthappa
